display_name: PSG: Calculated - Obstructive apnea (all desats) Hypopnea (3% desat) Index

other.DESCRIPTION: Obstructive Apnea Hypopnea Index at 3% desat.  Ratio of the count of all obstructive apneas plus the count of hypopneas associated with at least a 3% oxygen desaturation to the total sleep time expressed in hours.
